text:
Topsy@152 Bar is a charming and vibrant place with a lot to offer. The ambiance is cozy yet stylish, making it a perfect spot for both casual drinks and small gatherings. The cocktail menu is creative, with some unique twists on classic drinks that really stand out. I particularly enjoyed the [insert specific drink if applicable]—it was well-balanced and refreshing.

The staff is friendly and attentive, though during peak hours, service can slow down a bit. The food menu, while limited, has some tasty options, but I wish there were more variety or larger portions for the price.

One minor downside is the noise level when it gets busy, which can make conversations a bit challenging. That said, the overall vibe is lively and fun, so it’s a great place if you’re looking for energy.

Overall, Topsy@152 Bar is a solid choice for a night out. With a few tweaks, it could easily be a five-star experience!

Nice little divy place bar in Little India. I love their selection of Belgian beers. A pretty large choice of food for a small place. Service is good, no nonsense business. I like the staff.

Please keep that selection @owner of Topsy :-)

Enjoyable food! Great ambience! Fantastic night with friends!
Do approach the staff for recommendations and food pairings as the menu tends to change according to the chef's creativity.

Love this place! Good beer, good drinks and great bites! You have to try their broccoli! It pairs perfectly with drinks and such a great bar snack! Also their oysters are really good too! Great service and such a warm place if you’re looking for a nice place to chill with your friends ❤️

A few minutes from our apartment this was our lovely local bar
Loved the Guinness on tap
